channel.title: Sign error?
channel.description:
Ok well im using the new Pk planet client and it wont compile.. When i hit compile i get this error [code] [code ^ Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub4.java:5: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub5.java:5: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Class46.java:5: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Class34.java:14: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Class35.java:5: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Class36.java:5: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Class37.java:6: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Class38.java:6: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Class4.java:5: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Class41.java:6: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Class50.java:5: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ Gui.java:19: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ MP3Player.java:2: package javazoom.jl.player does not exist import javazoom.jl.player.Player; ^ MP3Player.java:9: cannot find symbol symbol : class Player location: class MP3Player private Player mp3Player; ^ Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:15: cannot find symbol symbol : variable FileOperations location: class Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(FileOperations .ReadFile(s)); ^ Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:131: cannot find symbol symbol : variable FileOperations location: class Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(FileOperations .ReadFile(s)); ^ client.java:187: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.midifade = 0; ^ client.java:188: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.midi = "stop"; ^ client.java:589: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.storeid = 32; //not really needed for us ^ client.java:590: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); ^ client.java:603: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(signlink.mainapp != null) ^ client.java:605: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.startthread(runnable, i); ^ client.java:617: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(signlink.mainapp != null) ^ client.java:618: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client return signlink.opensocket(i); ^ client.java:741: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.midifade = flag ? 1 : 0; ^ client.java:742: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.midisave(abyte0, abyte0.length); ^ client.java:772: cannot find symbol symbol : class Class7 location: class client Class7 class7 = new Class7(aByteArrayArrayArray1258, -60, 104, 104, anIntArrayArrayArray1214); ^ client.java:772: cannot find symbol symbol : class Class7 location: class client Class7 class7 = new Class7(aByteArrayArrayArray1258, -60, 104, 104, anIntArrayArrayArray1214); ^ client.java:893: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Class7 location: class client int k3 = Class7.anInt145; ^ client.java:899: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Class7 location: class client aClass25_946.method275(Class7.anInt145, -34686); ^ client.java:925: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(aBoolean960 && signlink.cache_dat != null) ^ client.java:1136: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client return signlink.wavereplay(); ^ client.java:1525: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror(aString1173 + " size mismatch in getnpcpos - po s:" + class30_sub2_sub2.anInt1406 + " psize:" + i); ^ client.java:1531: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror(aString1173 + " null entry in npc list - po s:" + i1 + " size:" + anInt836); ^ client.java:2164: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror("18622, " + flag + ", " + l + ", " + runtimeexc eption.toString()); ^ client.java:2515: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror("15283, " + byte0 + ", " + l + ", " + runtimeex ception.toString()); ^ client.java:3120: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Class7 location: class client Class7.aBoolean151 = false; ^ client.java:3144: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); ^ client.java:3160: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Class7 location: class client if(aBoolean960 && anInt1023 == 2 && Class7.anInt131 != anInt918) ^ client.java:3178: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror(aString1173 + " glcfb " + aLong1215 + "," + j + "," + aBoolean960 + "," + aClass14Array970[0] + "," + aClass42_Sub1_1068.me thod552() + "," + anInt918 + "," + anInt1069 + "," + anInt1070); ^ client.java:3214: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Class7 location: class client flag &= Class7.method189(k, abyte0, l, 6); ^ client.java:3226: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Class7 location: class client Class7.anInt131 = anInt918; ^ client.java:3268: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(signlink.mainapp != null) ^ client.java:3269: package signlink does not exist return signlink.mainapp.getAppletContext(); ^ client.java:3363: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Class7 location: class client Class7.method173((byte)-107, new Class30_Sub2_Sub2(class30_sub2_sub3 .aByteArray1420, 891), aClass42_Sub1_1068); ^ client.java:3441: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client return signlink.wavesave(abyte0, i); ^ client.java:4106: cannot find symbol symbol : class Update location: class client new Update((new StringBuilder()).append("Enter a url for your au to catch download").append(".zip").toString(), (new StringBuilder()).append("the name of the zip here").append(".zip").toString(), signlink.findcachedir()); ^ client.java:4106: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client new Update((new StringBuilder()).append("Enter a url for your au to catch download").append(".zip").toString(), (new StringBuilder()).append("the name of the zip here").append(".zip").toString(), signlink.findcachedir());
^ client.java:4200: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(!signlink.reporterror) ^ client.java:4209: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(!signlink.reporterror) ^ client.java:4218: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(!signlink.reporterror) ^ client.java:5635: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror = false; ^ client.java:5810: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(signlink.mainapp != null) ^ client.java:5811: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client return signlink.mainapp; ^ client.java:6636: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client class9.aString248 = "You last logged in " + s + " from: " + sign link.dns; ^ client.java:6992: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(signlink.mainapp != null) ^ client.java:6993: package signlink does not exist return signlink.mainapp.getDocumentBase().getHost().toLowerCase(); ^ client.java:7239: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.errorname = s; ^ client.java:8206: cannot find symbol symbol : class Update location: class client new Update((new StringBuilder()).append("http://www.xlinescape.com/client1").app end(".zip").toString(), (new StringBuilder()).append("client").append(".zip").to String(), "./"); ^ client.java:8222: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(signlink.sunjava) ^ client.java:8230: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if(signlink.cache_dat != null) ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 100 errors Press any key to continue . . .][/code] I dont understand :( Can someone smart please help me?

item.title: Sign error?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Despair, post:2, topic:337716”]import sign.signlink;
You didn’t put that in it.[/quote]
Where would i go about putting this? O.o
As i mentioned im new to coding =\

Read full topic

item.title: Sign error?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

import sign.signlink;

You didn’t put that in it.

Read full topic
